Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC12.name: matchingColor()

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC12.name: calculateRGBComponents()
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC12.abstract: Calculates the RGB color components of a color as a CGFloat value, even if it is the grayscale space. Values for red, green, and blue can be of any range due to API changes. Values between 0.0 - 1.0 are in the sRGB gamut range.

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC12.name: calculateRGBComponentIntegers()
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC12.abstract: Calculates the RGB color components of a color as an Integer value, even if it is the grayscale space. Values between 0.0 - 255.0 are in the sRGB gamut range.

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC12.name: brighterThan(_:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC12.abstract: Whether or not the color brightness is higher than a provided brightness value.
